other key archaeological monuments. Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters. He's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly,'' Eric Schmidt said.`` As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier. Profit climbed 29 percent to$ 2.54

MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained`` more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers.'' The article asks, Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page? While there's no reason to think Google would kill off Google Apps, there are scenarios that could trouble enterprise customers, Gartner analysts say. Google investors could conceivably push the company to spin out the Google

of the morning are the early peeks in The New York Times at former Defense Donald Rumsfeld 's memoir, which goes on sale next week. A few highlights from the Post's report: Donald Rumsfeld goes so far as to depict former President Bush as presiding over a national security process that was marked by incoherent decision-making and policy drift, most damagingly on the war in Iraq. `` Donald Rumsfeld remains largely unapologetic about his overall handling of the Iraq conflict and concludes that the war has been worth the costs. of last resort has long been the claim of`` misquote''. You see it all the time when public figures find themselves hoisted and hung out to dry by their own words- out comes the cliche: My words were taken out of context .
